revised_title: Depression of Freezing Point in Very Dilute Aqueous Solutions
tldr: This article presents experiments on the depression of the freezing point in very dilute aqueous solutions of electrolytes. The results support the ionization theory and provide insights into the degree of ionization in dilute solutions. The study also compares the conclusions drawn from the freezing point depression and conductivity measurements, offering a better understanding of the behavior of electrolyte solutions.
